page.title: 17Life-styles.
page.content: Hairstyles of 1985. In Cardiff today you see many young people with strange hairstyles.They are called Punks.Some have their hair dyed black and set into sharp spikes all over the head.Others have the sides of their heads shaved and the hair in the middle dyed red with blue stripes which stick up.These are called Mohicans after the American Indians.Others just dye their hair outrageous colours like orange,pink, purple and yellow.Skinheads have all their hair cut off so that they appear to be bald.There is another style called a rat's tail which is when all the hair is cut short except for a bit which is left long at the back.These young people wear their hair in strange styles to shock their parents and other grown ups.Many of the young people are unemployed.
